paragraph.paragraph:
When you inherit
/libraries/wel/reference/support/wel_application_chart.xml WEL_APPLICATION , you will need to implement the deferred feature main_window as a once function. This will be the main window of your application, and can be any descendent of ../../reference/windows/WEL_COMPOSITE_WINDOW_chart.htmlWEL_COMPOSITE_WINDOW.
paragraph.note:
Note. See
/libraries/wel/samples/tutorial/step2/index.xml step2 in the
/libraries/wel/samples/tutorial/index.xml tutorial for a simple demonstration of how to do this.
